title: In Rank Game. Skill shot didn't work. seems like some kind of bug.
body:
my last game with Champion Kataria. I was playing alright without any problems for about 20mins.
All of a sudden, Skill shot Q and R didn't work at all as well as basic attack.
I found out i couldn't do anything so I did Re-boot and Re-connect.
Also tried change as a defualt, didn't work.
my team tried to hold the game up for 10min but ended up with losing cuz i was very important and my most importat 2 skill shot didn't work so couldn't do anything.
i want Riot to figure out what happed to me.
or if anyone knows what was the problem, please comment on this.
Thank you and i'm so frustrated...

replies.body:
>skill-shot
>kataria

wut

Anyway, this has happened occasionally to players, and that's all I know. There's probably already a discussion about it somewhere already. I've never experienced it myself. You'd have better luck posting this in the [Bug Report board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
